description: Add Weight (Pretrained) takes Is Fine Tune and Is Use Public Weight as inputs and outputs a pretrained weight tensor. If Is Fine Tune is true, the weight can be fine-tuned during training; if Is Use Public Weight is true, the pretrained weight is loaded from a public source.
